Text: Cbr/cbz is the format for comics.  Google comic reader cbr to find an application to read them in.  I know there is at least 1 for Android and multiple for Windows/Mac/Linux
They are technically Zip and Rar files, Comic Book Rar = CBR, Comic Book Zip = CBZ - But you DO NOT inzip/unrar them, download ComicRack it is a free and wonderful comic reader :D
Which publisher is this from? Marvel, IDW? It would help to know which before deciding to download.
This is Marvel not Dreamwave or IDW.
